newsitem.title: USA: Applix Inc sees Q1 loss.
newsitem.headline: Applix Inc sees Q1 loss.

text.p: Applix Inc said Monday evening that it expected to post a first-quarter loss on revenues of about $11 million.
Before the company's statement, Wall Street analysts were forecasting first-quarter earnings of $0.18 per share, according to a First Call survey.
The company, which produces software applications, did not provide an exact estimate of its expected loss. Officials were not immediately available for further comment.
The company said its forecast was based on a slowdown in its European business and several large transactions that would not be completed during the quarter.

"We have undertaken several initiatives during the past year with new product introductions and acquisitions, and we remain confident in our business strategy and are optimistic about the company's long-term prospects," Applix said.
